author: barnabemonnot
content: a nice overview of current MEV research, with some notes on how 1559 burning is additive to protocol security: https://research.paradigm.xyz/MEV

author: barnabemonnot
content: really recommend charlie noyes interview with bankless too, where he expands on some of these 1559-related points (from august 2020): http://podcast.banklesshq.com/26-eth-has-to-be-money-charlie-noyes
